title: The minimum clear floor height (finished floor to finished ceiling) of rehabilitation tenement room shall be 2
clause_text: The minimum clear floor height (finished floor to finished ceiling) of rehabilitation tenement room shall be 2.75 m. and any toilet shall have a clear minimum floor height of 2.40 m.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
